## Stretched Parabolas (v`r params$rseed`)

Consider the stretched parabola $y=ax^2$, where $a$ is any constant.

```{r,echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
as = c(1,2,3,2,3,4,9)
ps = c(1,1,1,-1,-1,-1,-1)

aa = character()
for(i in 1:length(as)){
    a = as[i]
    p = ps[i]
    if(p==1){
        aa = c(aa,paste0(a))
    } else {
        aa = c(aa,paste0("\\frac{",sign(a),"}{",abs(a),"}"))
    }
    if(a==1){
        aa = ""
    }
}

quads = paste0("$",aa,"x^2$")

x = -10:10

cns = c("$x$",quads)

mydf = data.frame(x)

library(MASS)

for(i in 1:length(as)){
    mydf = cbind(mydf,paste0(fractions(as[i]^ps[i]*x^2)))
}

colnames(mydf)= cns

kableExtra::kable(mydf)

```
